branding.tagline: Experience Korea, one webtoon at a time

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Romance, Fantasy, and Supernatural Korean webtoons
publishing_focus.target_audience: K-Drama/K-pop fans, Korean culture enthusiasts, and manhwa lovers, aged 15 and above
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our collaboration with prominent Korean webtoon artists enables us to deliver authentic, original K-manhwa content
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles similar to 'The God of High School' and 'Solo Leveling'; authors like Yongje Park
